questions.quote: Who's got the tickets? GEORGE I do.  I thought you knew this mall. You said you'd been here before!
Oh come on, George, please put it in a garage. I don't want to spend an hour looking for a space.
Jerry, I'd give you the watch. It's not the money, I happen to like it.
Ok, fine. I'll go back... You know, our goal should be a society *without* *classes*! [She goes through the curtain to, ick, *coach*] Do you realise that the people up here are getting *cookies*!
Listen, listen I'm gonna go call work to see if I can get my deadline extended. I can't...come up with anything for this thing.
So, thanks again for those tickets. But next week, I'm going to take you. How about next Tuesday night?  And why don't you come along?
What physical characteristic would you say is common to all of them?
He's older, completely covered in filth, no whistle, but I think it's him.
Eh, they're trying to pick out a new couch - you don't want to know.  Give me your wallet, or I'll spill your guts right here on the street!
Well we gotta make a plan before they come back, what are we gonna do?
